## Observation notes  
First documented by Sladen 1919, with extensive historical record in the Pacific Maritime. Ratti et al. 2008: <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>. Spencer Entomological Collection, UBC: 2015, <span class="hl-place-name">Tsawwassen</span>. M. Clausen, Masters thesis: 2017, <span class="hl-place-name">Delta</span>. Guzman et al., 2023: 2005; 2007; 2009; 2012; 2015, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. 2013; 2016, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>. 2016, <span class="hl-place-name">Abbotsford</span>. NBSBC Bee Atlas Database: 2021, 2022; 2022, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>; 2022, <span class="hl-place-name">Sunshine Coast</span>; 2023, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. iNaturalist: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Squamish</span>, from 2014.
